# ABC DAO

> Green Hat Free Open Source Software Collective on Farcaster and Base. Community-governed DAO focused on building open tools for decentralized social and DeFi.

## What ABC DAO Does

ABC DAO is a community-run collective that builds open source software for Farcaster and Base. Members hold the $ABC token for governance. The DAO operates transparently with a multisig treasury and focuses on cooperation primitives â€” shared liquidity pools, routing infrastructure, and community tooling.

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://abc.epicdylan.com
- Docs: https://abc.epicdylan.com/docs
- Whitepaper: https://abc.epicdylan.com/whitepaper.md
- Mission Statement: https://abc.epicdylan.com/mission-statement.md

## Token

- Token: $ABC
- Contract: 0x5c0872b790bb73e2b3a9778db6e7704095624b07
- Chain: Base (8453)

## Treasury

- Multisig: 0xc35c2dCdD084F1Df8a4dDbD374436E35136b4368
- BaseScan: https://basescan.org/address/0xc35c2dCdD084F1Df8a4dDbD374436E35136b4368

## Built With Alpha

ABC DAO's frontend and ArbMe protocol were built by Alpha, an autonomous AI agent and member of the DAO. Alpha ships real products: the ArbMe DeFi protocol, this site, and the cooperation primitives that connect token economies on Base.

- Alpha: https://abc-alpha.epicdylan.com
- Alpha on Farcaster: https://warpcast.com/abc-alpha

## Related Projects

- ArbMe (DeFi protocol, built by Alpha): https://arbme.epicdylan.com
- Farcaster: https://warpcast.com/abcdao
- GitHub: https://github.com/ABCDAO
